hero.heading: ARENA
hero.subheading: Multiplayer online game with blockchain integration and minimalist pixel graphics, where players battle each other in real-time gladiator arenas.

features.title: Game Features
features.description: A gaming experience combining strategy, chance, and blockchain technology.

battles.title: Dynamic Battles
battles.description: Fast-paced duels based on provably fair system.
battles.content: Each battle is a short duel lasting up to 2 minutes, where every decision affects the outcome.

tokens.title: Glory Tokens
tokens.description: Battle stakes are made using the in-game Glory token.
tokens.content: Win battles, earn tokens and climb the ranks to become the arena champion.

nft.title: Arena Master Key NFTs
nft.description: Collection of 3,333 unique NFTs with real utility.
nft.content: NFT owners receive passive income, exclusive access, customization options and the ability to rent NFTs to other players.

chances.title: Equal Chances
chances.description: Balance of randomness and strategy for all players.
chances.content: Thanks to transparent mechanics, newcomers and experienced players have equal chances to win.

battle.title: Battle System
battle.description: Simple yet engaging battle system with maximum transparency.

strike.title: Powerful Strike
strike.description: High damage but low hit probability (about 30%).

defense.title: Defensive Stance
defense.description: Reduces incoming damage by 50% in the next turn.

lunge.title: Precise Lunge
lunge.description: Small guaranteed damage with critical hit chance (10%).

fairplay.title: Provably Fair System
fairplay.description: All battle mechanics, hit probability and critical strikes are implemented using the Provably Fair system. Players can independently verify the results of any battle.

items.transparency: Fully transparent algorithm with verifiable results
items.chances: Equal chances for victory for all participants
items.winner: Winner takes the entire stake pool minus commission (4%)

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.description: Economic model built on the Glory token and NFT system with real utility.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Development plan and key milestones for TIB ARENA

mvp.title: MVP
mvp.description: Core battle loop, stakes, Glory token, basic interface and NFT presale

items.token: Glory token implementation and staking system
items.nft: Preparation for Arena Master Key NFT presale

launch.title: Main Launch

items.nft: Full NFT integration with passive income features

scaling.title: Scaling
scaling.description: Mobile version, expanded customization and social features

items.mobile: iOS and Android mobile app release
items.mechanics: Additional battle mechanics and tactical elements

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: DAO, NFT marketplace, NFT rental and partnership integrations

items.marketplace: NFT marketplace for trading Arena Master Keys
items.rental: NFT rental system for passive income

nft.title: Arena Master Key NFTs
nft.description: Collection of 3,333 unique NFTs with real utility and valuable benefits for holders.

passive.title: Passive Income
passive.description: Earn 2% from the commission of all battles happening in the arena

exclusive.title: Exclusive Access
exclusive.description: Access to private arenas with reduced commission and improved coefficients

customization.title: Unique Customization
customization.description: Exclusive avatars, armor and weapons for your gladiator

rental.title: NFT Rental
rental.description: Rent your NFT to other players, earning a share of their winnings

stats.title: Unique Features
stats.description: What makes TIB ARENA truly special

gameplay.title: Short and Dynamic Battles
gameplay.description: Each round lasts up to 2 minutes, perfect for quick engagement and frequent gaming sessions. The fast pace keeps attention and encourages players to return again.

fair.title: Equal Chances to Win
fair.description: The balance of randomness and strategy makes winning chances equal for everyone. Newcomers can successfully compete with experienced players thanks to the transparent Provably Fair system.

social.title: Real-time Spectator Mode
social.description: Watch other players' duels, learn strategies, cheer for favorites and become part of the gladiator community.

surprise.title: Bonuses and Rewards
surprise.description: Random Glory token airdrops for active players, daily free battles and streak system motivate returning to the game every day.

cta.title: Join the Gladiator Arena
cta.description: Become part of a gaming ecosystem with daily rewards, dynamic battles and transparent blockchain economy.
